languages.text:
This character is an unsanctioned psyker, dangerous and uncontrolled.
All {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} used by this character have 5% chance to trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} and are resolved as if the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} was +1 level higher.
languages.original_text:
Этот персонаж — опасный и неуправляемый несанкционированный псайкер.
При применении им {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосил{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозы варпа{/g} могут появиться с шансом 5%, а значение {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинга{/g} при расчетах становится на 1 выше.

traits.locale_text:
This character is an unsanctioned Psyker, dangerous and uncontrolled.
All psychic powers used by this character has +20% chance to trigger psychic phenomena and resolved as if the Psyker's psy rating was +1 level higher.

This character is an unsanctioned psyker, dangerous and uncontrolled.
All psychic powers used by this character have +20% chance to trigger psychic phenomena and are resolved as if the psyker's psy rating was +1 level higher.

This character is an unsanctioned psyker, dangerous and uncontrolled.
All {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} used by this character have 5% chance to trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}perils of the warp{/g} and are resolved as if the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} was +1 level higher.

This character is an unsanctioned psyker, dangerous and uncontrolled.
All {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} used by this character have 5% chance to trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} and are resolved as if the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} was +1 level higher.

languages.text:
该角色是未获授权的灵能者，非常危险，不受控制。
该角色所有的{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}触发{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}几率都会提高5%，所有灵能能力的效果都视为{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}提高1级。
languages.original_text:
This character is an unsanctioned psyker, dangerous and uncontrolled.
All {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} used by this character have 5% chance to trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} and are resolved as if the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} was +1 level higher.

traits.locale_text:
该角色是未获授权的灵能者，非常危险，不受控制。
该角色所有的{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}触发{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}几率都会提高5%，所有灵能能力的效果都视为{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}提高1级。

languages.text:
Este personaje es un psíquico no autorizado, peligroso y descontrolado.
Todos los {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} que use este personaje tienen un 5 % de probabilidad de provocar {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g} y se resuelven como si su {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} fuera +1 nivel más alto.
languages.original_text:
This character is an unsanctioned psyker, dangerous and uncontrolled.
All {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} used by this character have 5% chance to trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} and are resolved as if the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} was +1 level higher.

traits.locale_text:
Este personaje es un psíquico no autorizado, peligroso y descontrolado.
Todos los {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} que use este personaje tienen un 5 % de probabilidad de provocar {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g} y se resuelven como si su {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} fuera +1 nivel más alto.

languages.text:
このキャラクターは非公認の異能者だ。危険な力を持ち、制御されていない。
このキャラクターが使う{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}はすべて +5% の確率で{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な歪み{/g}を起こすが、異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}が +1増加すると解消される。

traits.locale_text:
Этот персонаж — опасный и неуправляемый несанкционированный псайкер.
При применении им {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}психосил{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}пси-морок{/g} может появиться с шансом 20%, а значение {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинга{/g} при расчетах становится на 1 выше.

Этот персонаж — опасный и неуправляемый несанкционированный псайкер.
При применении им {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}психосил{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}пси-морок{/g} может появиться с шансом 20%, а значение {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинга{/g} при расчетах становится на 1 выше.

languages.text:
Dieser Charakter ist ein unbestätigter Psioniker, gefährlich und unkontrolliert.
Alle von diesem Charakter angewendeten {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kräfte{/g} haben eine um 5 % größere Chance, {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} auszulösen. Sie werden aufgelöst, als sei der {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} des Psionikers 1 Stufe höher.
languages.original_text:
This character is an unsanctioned psyker, dangerous and uncontrolled.

traits.locale_text:

languages.text:
Ce personnage est un psyker non assermenté, qui est à la fois dangereux et incontrôlable.
Tous les {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} utilisés par ce personnage ont 5 % de chances de déclencher des {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g} et sont résolus comme si l'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} du psyker était supérieur de +1 niveau.
languages.original_text:
This character is an unsanctioned psyker, dangerous and uncontrolled.
All {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} used by this character have 5% chance to trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} and are resolved as if the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} was +1 level higher.

traits.locale_text:
Ce personnage est un psyker non assermenté, qui est à la fois dangereux et incontrôlable.
Tous les {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} utilisés par ce personnage ont 5 % de chances de déclencher des {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g} et sont résolus comme si l'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} du psyker était supérieur de +1 niveau.

languages.text:
Bu karakter, onaysız bir ruhsezerdir. Tehlikeli ve kontrolsüzdür.
Bu karakterin kullandığı tüm {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi güçleri{/g}, %5 olasılıkla {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}öteboyut tehlikelerini{/g} tetikleyebilir ve ruhsezerin {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi derecesi{/g} +1 seviye daha yüksekmiş gibi hesaplanır.
